appDescription.message: A browser extension to copy web page content as AI-friendly format.

enableMagicCopy.description: Label for the master switch to enable/disable the feature

enableHoverTrigger.description: Label for the hover trigger switch

convertPage.description: Context menu item to convert page content

magicCopyWithPrompt.description: Context menu item for Magic Copy with custom prompts

hoverForPrompts.description: Tooltip text for prompt menu functionality

promptManagerSubtitle.message: Manage your AI assistant instruction templates

emptyStateDescription.message: Create your first prompt template to help AI assistants understand your needs more efficiently

templateHint.message: Use {content} as a placeholder for the copied text

promptTemplateHint.message: Use {content} as a placeholder for the copied text.

enableClipboardAccumulator.description: Label for the switch to enable the append mode

syncStatusUnavailable.description: Sync status when chrome.storage.sync is not available

syncStatusSyncing.description: Sync status when a sync is in progress

syncStatusFailed.description: Sync status when a sync has failed

syncSuccess.description: Notification message for successful manual sync

syncFailure.description: Notification message for failed manual sync, with a placeholder for the error message

justNow.description: Relative time format for events that just happened

minutesAgo.description: Relative time format for events that happened minutes ago

hoursAgo.description: Relative time format for events that happened hours ago

daysAgo.description: Relative time format for events that happened days ago

usageCount.description: Usage count format for a prompt

newPromptTitle.description: Title for the prompt editor modal when creating a new prompt

confirmDeleteSelectedTitle.description: Confirmation title for deleting selected prompts

confirmDeleteSelectedMessage.message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected $count$ prompts? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDeleteSelectedMessage.description: Confirmation message for deleting selected prompts

deleteSuccessMessage.description: Notification message after successfully deleting prompts

errorNoPromptsSelected.description: Error message when trying to delete without selecting any prompts

duplicateSuffix.description: Suffix added to the title of a duplicated prompt

duplicateSuccessMessage.description: Notification message after successfully duplicating a prompt

confirmDeleteSingleTitle.description: Confirmation title for deleting a single prompt

confirmDeleteSingleMessage.message: Are you sure you want to delete this prompt? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDeleteSingleMessage.description: Confirmation message for deleting a single prompt

deleteSingleSuccessMessage.description: Notification message after successfully deleting a single prompt

saveSuccessMessage.description: Notification message after successfully saving a prompt

saveSuccessNewPromptMessage.message: Prompt saved! You can now use it by right-clicking selected text on any webpage.
saveSuccessNewPromptMessage.description: Notification message after successfully saving a new prompt for the first time

errorFillInTitleAndTemplate.message: Please fill in both the title and template fields.
errorFillInTitleAndTemplate.description: Error message when trying to save a prompt with empty title or template

errorTemplateNeeded.description: Error message when trying to preview a prompt with no template content

exportSuccessMessage.description: Notification message after successfully exporting prompts

exportFailedMessage.description: Notification message when prompt export fails

importFailedMessage.description: Notification message when prompt import fails

importSuccessMessage.description: Notification message after successfully importing prompts

errorInvalidImportFile.description: Error message for an invalid import file

confirmImportWithDuplicates.message: Found $count$ duplicate prompts. Do you want to proceed? Duplicates will be skipped.
confirmImportWithDuplicates.description: Confirmation message when importing prompts with duplicates

previewSampleText.message: This is some sample text to demonstrate the effect of the prompt.
previewSampleText.description: Default sample text for the prompt preview modal

loadingSettingsFailed.description: Error message when settings fail to load

savingFailed.description: Error message when saving settings fails

initializationFailed.description: Error message when the options page fails to initialize

justCreated.description: Timestamp text for a newly created prompt

usageInstructionsTitle.description: Title for the usage instructions card

usageStep1Title.description: Title for the first step in usage instructions

usageStep1Desc.message: : Select the text you want to process on any webpage.

usageStep2Title.description: Title for the second step in usage instructions

chatServicesDescription.message: Manage AI chat services you can jump to

noDefault.description: No default option in chat service selection

defaultAutoOpen.description: Default auto open chat service switch label

serviceIcon.description: Chat service icon URL input label

useDefault.description: Use default chat service settings option
